ItemType.name: side-mounted Kale M1 repeater
ItemType.attributes: auxMountDevice, cabbageCorp, cabbageNotStandard, majorItem, repeater
ItemType.description: This version of the Kale M1 repeater has been modified for external mounting, and its fire controls are linked to a ship's primary weapon. It fires a cluster of light, high-velocity kinetic projectiles.
